mapper.select: SELECT a.guid, a.mailguid, a.instanceguid, a.instanceclassguid, a.instancetitle, a.createuserguid, a.createtime, a.fileguid, (select b.filename from bi_any_table_file b where b.guid = a.fileguid ) filename FROM bi_mail_attachment a WHERE a.mailguid = #MAILGUID# ORDER BY a.instanceclassguid, a.instancetitle
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bi_mail_attachment (guid, mailguid, instanceguid, instanceclassguid, instancetitle, createuserguid, createtime, fileguid) VALUES (#GUID#, #MAILGUID#, #INSTANCEGUID#, #INSTANCECLASSGUID#, #INSTANCETITLE#, #CREATEUSERGUID#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #FILEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#)
